description:
Richard Pérez-Peña is the International News Editor in London. Previously he covered breaking news for the National Desk. Since joining The New York Times in 1992, his beats have included higher education, the newspaper and magazine industry, health care, government and politics, transportation and courts.
Mr. Pérez-Peña is a father, a husband and a trivia geek. His pastimes include binge-watching TV shows, fixing stuff around the house (though he says he is not very good at it), playing the piano (not very good at that, either) and reading history books.
